name: Windows Media 9 Plug-in Profile File
summary: Profile created using the Microsoft Adobe Premiere 6.5 plug-in, which is used to export Premiere projects to Windows Media 9; contains exported project settings for the selected Adobe Premiere project, such as the video codec , metadata , and output file format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Adobe Premiere Pro with Microsoft Windows Media 9 plug-in
